name: Revenge Remake
description:
you Play as Stella Sukeiro a 16 Years OLD school Girl that has a BFF her name is Mina Atsu one day she woke up and lost her Memory one day she found a photo of her and Mina and she understanded that Mina is her BFF but she heard that she died the same day where she Lost her memory Stella discovered a Girl called Umi Nagiwara that Talked to her 3 friends about the Murder Stella discovered that she is the one who did that she will do everything for take her Revenge even if it means Killing her!

you Will need to find things that will make her discover new things until she remember ALL !

the game is in Pré Alpha State
